---
title: ELLISDON
author: ''
date: '2022-08-29'
slug: ellisdon
categories: []
tags: []
r_init: |-
  
description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $115.8M
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with ELLISDON. The average
  contract duration was 2.73 year, and the average contract
  value (not including contracts under $10k) was $32.9M.
  The longest contract was 9.83 year. The largest contract
  by value (including amendments) was $314.3M.
most_recent_fiscal_year_total: '115.8M'
most_recent_fiscal_year_year: '2021-2022'
s431_number_of_contracts_by_vendor: '26'
s431_number_of_contracts_by_vendor_with_amendments: '17'
s431_number_of_contracts_amendments_percentage: '65%'
s432_mean_amendment_increase_percentage_by_vendor: '6523%'
s434_mean_number_of_amendments_by_vendor: '4.41'
s433_total_amendment_increase_value_by_vendor: '546.7M'
s424_mean_duration_by_vendor: '2.73'
s421_mean_contract_value_by_vendor: '32.9M'
s425_max_duration_by_vendor: '9.83'
s422_max_contract_value_by_vendor: '314.3M'
